## 1D distributions ##

- categorical: barplot
- numeric: histogram -> density plot -> ecdf

## 2D distributions ##

- categorical x categorical: barplot
- numeric x numeric: scatterplot -> contours
- categorical x numeric: boxplot -> violin plot -> beeswarm

- `ggforce::facet_matrix()`
